header.title: Nkurobɔ Mu Nkitahodi Fapem
header.subtitle: Wo kwan tẽẽ a ɛkɔ Mayor ZOHRAN adwumayɛbea.

welcomeBanner.title: Wo Nne, Yɛn Kurow no Daakye
welcomeBanner.description: Akwaaba aba New York Kurow mufo nkitahodi fapem a ɛyɛ aban de no so. Te nka sɛ wubetumi abɔ Nkurobɔ ne Kurow no nyinaa mu nsɛm ho amanneɛ, adi Agenda akyi, na wo ne Mayor Zohran adwumayɛbea adi nkitaho tẽẽ.

welcomePage.agendaDescription: Hwɛ nneɛma a ehia paa a Mayor adwumayɛbea no reyɛ ho adwuma mprempren, efi akwan ne nneɛma a wɔde bɛyɛ adwuma so kosi ɔmanfo ahobammɔ so. Di nnwuma a ɛrekɔ so no akyi.
welcomePage.reportDescription: Woahu ɔhaw bi wɔ wo mpɔtam? Fa mfonini bi gu so, kyerɛkyerɛ ɔhaw no mu, na fa kɔma kurow no dwumadibea a ɛfa ho no tẽẽ.
welcomePage.chatDescription: Wowɔ asɛmmisa bi anaasɛ wopɛ sɛ wususuw nkurobɔ mu asɛm bi ho? Fa wo ho hyɛ Mayor adwumayɛbea no AI boafo no mu na nya nsɛm na kyɛ w'adwenem.
welcomePage.newsletterDescription: Kyerɛw wo din ma yɛn nnawɔtwe nkrataa krataa no na nya nsɛm foforo fa Mayor no agenda ne nkurobɔ mu nnwuma ho.
welcomePage.subscribeSuccess: Yɛda wo ase sɛ woakyerɛw wo din!
welcomePage.footer: © {year} New York Kurow Mayor Zohran Kwame Mamdani Adwumayɛbea. Hokwan nyinaa yɛ wɔn dea.

agenda.title: Mayor Adwumayɛbea no Agenda ahorow
agenda.description: Di nnwuma atitiriw a ɛrekɔ so wɔ kurow no mu nyinaa no akyi.
agenda.searchPlaceholder: Hwehwɛ agenda ahorow denam asɛmti anaa nkyerɛkyerɛmu so...
agenda.noItems: Ade biara nni hɔ a ɛne wo hwehwɛ no hyia.

chat.initialMessage: Eyi ne New York Kurow Mayor Zohran Mamdani adwumayɛbea. Yɛwɔ ha sɛ yebetie mo haw ne mo adwenkyerɛ a ɛfa yɛn kurow kɛse yi ho tẽẽ. Dɛn na ɛwɔ w'adwenem?
chat.placeholder: Kyerɛw wo nkra kɔma Mayor no...

report.uploadTitle: Fa W'anisoadehu ho Amanneɛbɔ Gu So
report.uploadDescription: Mia so anaasɛ twe na gyae mfonini anaa video tiawa bi (sɛkɛn 15 kɛkɛ)
report.promptPlaceholder: Kyerɛkyerɛ ɔhaw no mu (sɛ nhwɛso no 'agoru a abubu wɔ 0:05', 'yɛ tokuru no ho biribiri')
report.pinLocation: Si Beae a Ɛwɔ So Dua

card.pinned: Wɔasi so dua wɔ Asase mfonini so

feedback.prompt: Wɔasiesie asɛm yi ama w'ani agye anaa?
feedback.thankYou: Yɛda wo ase wɔ w'adwenkyerɛ ho!
feedback.commentsPlaceholder: Fa nsɛm a wopɛ ka ho...

confirmation.title: Wɔde Amanneɛbɔ no Akɔma Yiye!
confirmation.description: Wɔreyɛ w'amanneɛbɔ no ho adwuma mprempren. Wubetumi adi n'tebea akyi wɔ "Amanneɛbɔ a Mede Akɔma" ase.
confirmation.summary: Nneɛma a Wɔde Kɔmae no Nsɛm a Wɔaboaboa Ano
confirmation.locationPinned: Wɔde beae no asi amanneɛbɔ no so dua yiye.

error.videoTooLong: Video no ware dodo. Yɛsrɛ wo fa video a ennu sɛkɛn 15 gu so.
error.invalidFileType: Faele no su nyɛ. Yɛsrɛ wo fa mfonini anaa video faele gu so.

login.loginToContinue: Kɔ mu na ama woatumi akɔ so
login.joinCommunity: Fa wo ho kɔbɔ kuw no mu na hyɛ ase

map.title: Ma Amanneɛbɔ no ho Nsɛm a Ɛkɔ Akyiri
map.districtPlaceholder: sɛ nhwɛso no Manhattan Community District 5
map.contactPlaceholder: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wubisa nsɛm a ɛkɔ akyiri a
map.useCurrentLocation: Fa Mprempren Beae a Wowɔ no Di Dwuma

error.notSupported: Wo browser no ntumi nyɛ beae a wowɔ ho adwuma.
error.unableToRetrieve: Yentumi nyaa beae a wowɔ no. Yɛsrɛ wo ma beae a wowɔ ho nnwuma no nyɛ adwuma na san bɔ mmɔden.
error.nameRequired: Ɛsɛ sɛ ɔmannifo no din ba.
error.latLngRequired: Yɛsrɛ wo hyɛ latitude ne longitude mu.
error.invalidLatLng: Yɛsrɛ wo hyɛ latitude ne longitude a ɛyɛ nɔma a ɛteɛ mu.
error.invalidLatRange: Ɛsɛ sɛ latitude no yɛ -90 ne 90 ntam.
error.invalidLngRange: Ɛsɛ sɛ longitude no yɛ -180 ne 180 ntam.
